flawed_nl_solution:
Dani brings 2.5 x 12 = <<2.5*12=30>>30 cupcakes.
She needs this many cupcakes to feed everyone in class 27 + 2 = <<27+2=30>>30.
With the 3 students calling in sick, there are this many people in class today 30 - 3 = <<30-3=27>>27.
There are this many cupcakes left after everyone gets one 30 - 27 = <<30-27=3>>3 cupcakes.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 29, not 30. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
